official_title: A bill to amend the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness law to change the authorizations of appropriations for resource management review and grants.

summary.text: Amends provisions which established the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness in Minnesota to change the authorization of appropriations for resource management review and grants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness law to change the authorizations of appropriations for resource management review and grants.
